alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:32PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iberia Parish through 800 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Iberia. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Avery Island, Delcambre, Coteau, Lydia, Acadiana Regional Airport and Jefferson Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
